page.shortlink: api client api a5 panelnavigator panel object
page.description: Definition of a panel in the panel navigator.

property.name: name
property.description: The name of the panel. Used to access the panel in the navigator, such as when calling the A5.PanelNavigator.setActivePanel method.

property.name: title
property.description: The title (display friendly HTML) of the panel.

property.name: show
property.description: Whether or not to show the panel in the navigator. The default value is true.

property.name: close
property.description: Whether or not to show a close button if the panel navigator type is "tabband". The default value is false.

property.name: indicator
property.description: Overrides for the default indicator class names.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the dot in indicator element.

property.name: selectedClassName
property.description: The class name to put on the dot in indicator element when the panel is active.

property.name: has
property.description: Whether or not the panel has a previous panel button. The default value is false.

property.name: id
property.description: The ID of the button element (which must already be in the DOM). The default is "{panel.id}.CTRL.PREV".

property.name: has
property.description: Whether or not the panel has a next panel button. The default value is false.

property.name: id
property.description: The ID of the button element (which must already be in the DOM). The default is "{panel.id}.CTRL.NEXT".
